column2:
"Yo, <%me>.
It seems you have a grave task ahead of you."
"...We've heard about what happened. Let us do what we can to help."
"Marlu and I will do everything we can for you. Nothing Command say will change that."

"...You've spent so much of your precious time listening to us...
We want to return the favor."

"Not just listening to us. We're indebted to you many times over.
...In more ways than I can count."
"...So, now it's our turn to pay you back. Our power is yours."
"I don't know how much we'll be able to do, but... Well, we should be able to clear out some of the chaff."
